description: This file defines a Flask route for a health check endpoint, utilizing Flask-Smorest Blueprint and MethodView to create a simple health status API.

classes.name: HealthCheck
classes.description: A Flask view class for the health check endpoint, responding with a simple health status message.

methods.name: get(self)
methods.description: Handles GET requests to the health check route, returning a JSON message indicating health status.

ctags.name: blp
ctags.pattern: /^blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/

fields.name: blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/
